# RBNZ

The RBNZ package allows users to download data from the Reserve Bank of New Zealand website.

An overview of the package can be found on [CRAN](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/RBNZ/vignettes/Overview.html) or in [vignettes/Overview.Rmd](https://github.com/rntq472/RBNZ/blob/master/vignettes/Overview.Rmd).

## Installation

``` r
## Install from CRAN:
install.packages('RBNZ')

## Install the development version from GitHub:
## install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("rntq472/RBNZ")

```
